docs.text: Welcome to MkDocs ¶ For full documentation visit mkdocs.org . Команды ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Проект ¶ mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files. ¶
docs.title: Главная
